list_definition.definition: a long, thin instrument (usually of wood) containing a thin stick of graphite or some similar solid substance for writing or drawing

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This pencil needs sharpening / to be sharpened

list_definition.definition: to write or draw with a pencil

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He pencilled an outline of the house.
